lead_paragraph: A peach-and-rose-water compote poured over a grilled rose-water poundcake doubles the pleasure. But it’s also fine with ice cream.
snippet: A peach-and-rose-water compote poured over a grilled rose-water poundcake doubles the pleasure. But it’s also fine with ice cream.

headline.print_headline: Peach Compote with Rose Water Time: 20 minutes
